job_title: Director of Nursing in Richmond, VA
pros: Great people to work with. Love the residents
cons: Need more staff. Need to celebrate staff more.

review_title: You work with some great people
pros: The people you work with are great.
cons: Lack of communication and work/life balance

pros: Lakewood was a nice place to work. Good people, friendly residents, and a good environment to spend a lot of time in.
cons: They did not pay well, the raises were imsignificant, management was unimpressive. I could have easily done the jobs of the supervisors after just a few months.

job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse Floor, Clinic in Richmond, VA
pros: Worked there for many years.  Received alot of experience with the  elderly.  Pleasant work environment.formed  many lasting relationships with residents,families,staff.
cons: Left  to experience new  opportunity with a doctor I had known for many years to assist in opening his new doctor's practice.

review_title: RN floor nurse and fill in supervisor
pros: Great christian environment to work in,  good staff, love my residents
cons: no cons, Just want to broaden my horizons and gain new skill set with my RN

review_title: I learned a lot while working there, but too many favoritism goes on behind closed doors.
pros:
Money.
Christmas Bonus.
Employee Appreciation at Christmas.
Time Accrual
Insurance
Benefits for part-time and full-time.
cons:
Favoritism.
Too many managers.
Not friendly towards novice.

pros: Residents are very welcoming..There are really not a lot of cons for me.
cons: Bad management. No communication skills.. management Gossips and not professional
